Their goal is to push their physical limits and complete the challenges set by these athletes.

They find out later that Ma has been leaving the stall to take care of his deceased friend's aged mother.

programme.desc: The day Wang Zhongwen and Teresa Teng had agreed upon arrives, but Teresa never receives a call from him. Grandma Wang happily imagines their future life, only for Zhongwen to tell her they will not get married, leaving her saddened.

programme.title: Focus - EP 30

But can he deliver a domestic performance that equally satisfies the Malaysian people? And how will Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto's proactive foreign policy alter Indonesia's role on the international stage?

programme.desc: A single woman will date six different men and meet their families. Next, the woman must choose one of the six men to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 50
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: Ketoprak Spesial Cintanya Gak Ngakal
programme.desc: In his dream, a ketoprak seller is driving around and is nearly hit by a car driven by Devan (Kenny Austin), who looks just like him. The ketoprak seller is confused by his sudden wealth. Meanwhile, a female ketoprak seller is also confused by her sudden wealth.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 48
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cinta Susu Murni Bukan Kaleng Kaleng
programme.desc: While delivering milk to a cow, Vira meets a boy named Gilang. The two argue because Gilang accidentally almost caused Vira an accident. To apologize, Gilang makes up for it by working on Vira's farm. The two grow closer, and without realizing it, Gilang turns out to be the childhood friend Vira has waited 15 years for and never returned.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 502
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 28
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Cinta Bersyarat Roro Jongrang
programme.desc: Roro Jongrang meets Nando in the forest, but conflict arises when they discover they come from rival families. After a series of tragic events and trials, they decide to marry, but a natural disaster destroys their plans and changes everything.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 48

programme.title: Neng Rujak Emang Boleh Ya Segalak Itu
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Arina (Ersya Aurelia) sells fruit salad. Arina joins a matchmaking app and meets a handsome, long-haired man. Afraid of meeting him in real life, she asks her friend Ria to fill in for her. Initially, Ria refuses, but eventually agrees to meet the man on the app at Arina's insistence. However, a strange incident occurs when Arina is caught impersonating someone else while on the phone with the man.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 502
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: KING OF GENDANG TIBA TIBA NIKAH
programme.desc: Denny (Rendy Kjaernett), the drummer, suddenly has to marry Rina Diana due to urgent circumstances. Knowing that Denny has married without telling her, Denny's mother is furious. Moreover, Denny's mother doesn't like Tiwi (Rina Diana). Will Tiwi be able to win her mother-in-law's heart?

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 29
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 49
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Jodoh Direview Cinta Yang Viral
programme.desc: Aqila is a very famous vlogger. However, Aqila dresses in Sailormoon cosplay and calls herself Sailorfood. Sailorfood reviews food and tells the truth about its deliciousness, whether it's delicious or not, through live broadcasts.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 50

programme.title: Circle Abang Cilok Mood Banget
programme.desc: Bang Toyib (Masaji Wijayanto) is constantly harassed by Sumi (Shanice Margaretha). Sumi lies to her father, claiming she is pregnant and that Bang Toyib got her pregnant. However, Bang Toyib continues to deny that he never got Sumi pregnant.

programme.title: Jihan Show S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa - EP 6
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Cakap Melayu Lah! - EP 2
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom yang berkisarkan tentang Encik Daud, Puan Rozita, Mak Som, Abdul dan beberapa pelajar di sebuah sekolah bahasa di KL.

programme.title: Sape Terer - EP 6
programme.desc: Sape Terer merupakan 'game show' terbaharu yang mempertemukan artis otai dan artis baharu bersaing merebut gelaran juara setiap episod.

programme.title: Awak Suka Saya Tak? - EP 5
programme.desc: Intan mencintai Hilman Yong, Sejak kemalangan berlaku Hilman hilang menjadi Damien Yong. Kini Intan terpaksa menyayangi bekas suaminya dari jauh dan menunggu Hilman kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Meja Bulat Sepahtu - EP 4
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara santai yang di hos kan oleh Sepahtu dengan pelbagai topik menarik dan terkini.

programme.title: Potong - EP 4
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang pemuda Midun, yang kini menyambung legasi perkhidmatan berkhatan tradisional peninggalan arwah bapanya, seorang Tok Mudim handal di kampung.

programme.title: Lawak Sorang - Sorang - EP 13
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan " Stand Up Comedy " gabungan antara Malaysia dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Dapur Chef Ammar - EP 8
programme.desc: Saksikan kehebatan dan kepakaran Chef Ammar dalam menyediakan pelbagai hidangan masakan dan makanan ala Arab yang lazat lagi penuh berkhasiat ini.

programme.title: Skrin Komedia: Tuyul Ke London - EP 2
programme.desc: Drama komedi seram tentang sepasang pencuri bertindak menggunakan seekor tuyul untuk mengembangkan jenayah mereka tapi perancangan mereka membawa mereka bertembung dengan pelbagai hantu yang tak disangka.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 14
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 1
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita (noNI iKI artis koTA).

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 6
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 2
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 16
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 3
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Klik Riders - EP 26
programme.desc: Sebuah program untun tontonan semua.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 7

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 6

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories - EP 6

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: Manamagale Vaa

programme.title: Caroline Cherie
programme.desc: France, 1789. The Revolution is brewing. In order to ensure the safety of his daughter Caroline, the Comte de Bievres marries her to the sinister lawyer Georges Berthier, future member of the Convention. But the young woman understands nothing of politics and her heart belongs to another, Gaston de Sallanches.

programme.title: Panier De Crabes
programme.desc: A city-dweller in his 30s, who is recovering from burnout, stops next to a wild lake. Whereas he thought that he had found solitude and tranquillity, the place turns out to be not as calm and isolated as it appeared.

programme.title: Mon Quebec, C'est L'hiver
programme.desc: Music, dance and circus: a show that warms the heart! Well bundled up, the biggest names in Quebec music take turns in dazzling scenes at the foot of the Mont-Tremblant slopes, in the heart of the Laurentians.

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: A fusion of dance and music through drums and movement, a collective invitation to an explosive performance, a response to coming down, the descent after ecstasy. A choreographic work by Melissa Guex, with music by Clement Grin.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !

Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 7
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde shares one of her best addresses for antique hunting in Aisne. She then heads off to the Cote d'Opale to one of the most ''arty'' guesthouses in the region. Last but not least, she tries basketwork with Corinne, the last basketmaker in the region.

programme.title: Taishan, Une Montagne Dans Le Ciel
programme.desc: A natural jewel and an open-air museum, Mount Tai, or Taishan, is also a spiritual home for several religions. During her ascent, Alice Roche reveals, step by step, how this place has become, throughout history, a symbol of peace and national unity in China.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 6
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares sauteed chicken with green chili.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Interieurs - EP 7
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde shares one of her best addresses for antique hunting in Aisne. She then heads off to the Cote d'Opale to one of the most ''arty'' guesthouses in the region. Last but not least, she tries basketwork with Corinne, the last basketmaker in the region.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 23
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 26
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 39
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 4
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 25
programme.desc: The friends Pokou and Boni made in the parallel world arrive to help them: the battle against the rival prince is fierce.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 26
programme.desc: Thanks to Pokou, the battle has been won! All that remains now is for her to return home, surrounded by her faithful friends.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 11
programme.desc: Ilet a Bourse, nestling in the heart of the Cirque of Mafate, is steeped in family lore. A hamlet where several generations grew up together and where few have ever wanted to leave. In harmony with nature, the locals live thanks to a system of mutual help and solidarity.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les ChefsÂ ! - EP 1
programme.desc: For the first challenge, the twelve contestants of this fourteenth brigade must draw inspiration from the arrival of spring. On the menu: a lamb dish with all-green sides.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The presenter of the programme ''Aux Frontieres du Cosmos'' is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. With an investigation that seems totally surreal, Greco needs to keep a cool head, particularly when Beretta falls under the charm of the astrophysicist sent to lend a hand, and starts believing in flying saucers.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche - EP 8
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Les Cadors
programme.desc: Antoine, a married man with two children who is a boat driver, and Christian, a single unemployed man who is always getting into fights: two completely opposite brothers. But when Antoine, the perfect husband, gets involved in some dirty business, Christian arrives in Cherbourg to come to his aid and reconnect with him.

programme.title: La Grande Arche
programme.desc: When the austere district of La Defense, a symbol of modernity, becomes the setting for a reflection on architecture, memory, and power.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 12
programme.desc: Margot has had an accident and has been put into a drug-induced coma. In her dreams, she relives some of the key moments in her life.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 13
programme.desc: Louis and Dominique sort through Margot's personal effects. Alice packs her bags ready to go abroad. eleonore and Jean-Baptiste want to find somewhere new to move to, a place to settle down.

programme.desc: Marshlands are not simply rich in biodiversity, they are also essential in adapting to climate change.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale, they're playing for national pride. All-Stars from "American Ninja Warrior" face off against teams from Japan and Europe for bragging rights.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale, they're playing for national pride. All-Stars from "American Ninja Warrior" face off against teams from Japan and Europe for bragging rights.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: Bluey is the ringmaster in a game of circus with her friends, but Hercules wants to play his motorcycle game instead. Luckily, Bluey has a solution to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 39
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 42
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: During the Veggies' Super Sidekick Costume Contest, Evil Pea traps Supertato in a jar of honey. All is lost until the Veggies become real super sidekicks, the Tato Team!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Supertato invites Evil Pea to his sleepover, but Carrot is suspicious and vows to stay up all night to make sure she can't unleash any of her evil plans.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Supertato and the Veggies have built a super sandcastle, but Evil Pea wants to storm it by firing her hordes of Mini Peas at it with her pea shooter.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: The veggies are playing walkie-talkie hide-and-seek, but Evil Pea steals Carrot's walkie-talkie and uses it to trick the Veggies into getting trapped by the Corn Cobs.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: It's Evil Pea's birthday, but she and Carrot are trapped in the bottom of her freezer. They must put their differences aside and work together to escape.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late!

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea creates an evil version of her nemesis, Supertato. With the help of her hench-Cobs, Evil Pea makes a big, green lumbering spud that she names Monstertato!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 56
programme.desc: Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and Panda are helping Cynthia in her garden - JoJo loves how tall the sunflowers are. Cynthia gives JoJo a present of some sunflower seeds - JoJo can keep them ready to plant and grow more sunflowers next year.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 17
programme.desc: Lorenzo decides to play a dangerous trick on his loyal coach Beppe.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 41
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 42
programme.desc: When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Supertato and Broccoli go on a pirate adventure with Captain Pak Choi, but they don't realise she intends on plundering Evil Pea's freezer and stealing all her shiny things.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 29

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but his daring plan is interrupted by Grandmaster Glitch, who's careering down the mountain in a giant snowball.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S4) - EP 3
programme.desc: Zahra-Rose's dish is Somalian nafaqo, made using mashed potato stuffed with boiled egg.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 2

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2

programme.desc: Rachel celebrates the indulgent side of chocolate. She creates a luxurious chocolate mousse with a twist, and adds a chocolatey take to a pasta dish, cacio e pepe.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S9) - EP 4
programme.desc: It's Week 4 and the remaining sewers create zero-waste trousers, upcycle tote bags and repurpose crochet blankets in Reduce, Reuse and Recycle week.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S2) - EP 6
programme.desc: Gemini and James had it all planned out when they bought their three-bed home in Surrey. Expecting a new baby, they would move in and do the place up.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo explores the food secrets of Italy's deep south starting in Matera, Basilicata, a UNESCO site. He learns more about the cave houses around the city, meets an 86-year-old woman who teaches him how to make fried lampascioni balls made from hyacinth bulbs and learns the secret of the bread Matera is famous for.

programme.title: Jamie's Cook Ahead Christmas (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Jamie's get-ahead Christmas reaches the days and night before with a silky chicken liver pate starter, a genius new way to cook the turkey, an epic Yorkshire pudding and the best roasties ever, all prepped ahead of time for a no-stress Christmas day!

programme.title: Guillaume's Paris (S1) - EP 9

programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16) - EP 41

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1) - EP 17

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3) - EP 2

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 17

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork - EP 18

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays - EP 4

programme.title: The Observers

They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say (R)
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Gentle Journeys (R)
programme.desc: A journey to the different places around Japan.

programme.title: Nosy's Inspiring Atelier (R)
programme.desc: Curious fairies "Nosy" create unique works using their imaginations, inspired by interesting phenomena and materials they found in the world of humans. Letâ€™s express your idea through creation with Nosy, as you think and explore.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: Whiz-Kids TV
programme.desc: Let's cooperate with TV warriors and take on various missions to revive the symbol tree of "Geoworld," a mysterious otherworldly realm rich in nature!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: Rokkaku Seiji's Nomitetsu Railroad Trip: Geibi Line, Kisuki Line & Ichibata Elec
programme.desc: An actor Rokkaku Seiji, who loves both train and liquor, travels around Japan by rail. He stops over at stations he likes and explores the streets. Enjoy the fun-filled railroad trip with the music he selects!

programme.title: NHK News 845
programme.desc: Today's latest metropolitan area news and weather information program.

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's mainstay evening news program.

programme.title: The 18-year-olds Festival: Vaundy
programme.desc: The 18-year-olds Festival is a stage project where an artist creates a new song in tune with the emotions of 18-year-olds and performs it in a one-time special collaboration with 1,000 of them. This ninth edition features Vaundy.

programme.title: Sleepless Night Talk with the Singer AI
programme.desc: The artist AI listens to your problems about parenting, work, and relationships. If you've had a tough day, join us for 30 minutes-this program may help you find a brighter tomorrow.

programme.title: News Commentary
programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: International News Report 2025
programme.desc: An international news program providing in-depth report on what is happening around the world. (Dual audio when available)

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Fake Buster
programme.desc: Fake news may affect anyone unconsciously and easily. In this program, specialists discuss the way to defend ourselves against fake information.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Davao, located on Mindanao Island, is home to 1.7 million people. Global business such as call centres are now thriving here. This city is often cited as being one of the safest in the Philippines.

programme.title: Through the Kitchen Window
programme.desc: We visit the kitchen of Isogai Hamako - which is in a small mountain town of just five people - and share in distinctive foodways and smiles along the way.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities - people pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Takasago Masami generates almost no plastic waste composting instead of plastic bags for food scraps or doing dishes with a cloth instead of a disposable sponge - little ideas that are fun and easy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Bon Odori: Rhythm and Connection
programme.desc: The Bon Odori dance, a Japanese summer tradition, has gone global. We look at events held in Malaysia and Brazil and explore the rhythms that bring people from diverse backgrounds together.

programme.title: A Culture Built with Wood
programme.desc: Hida: The Hida region in Gifu Prefecture has some of Japan's most extensive broadleaf forests and has been home to artisans who possess sophisticated woodworking skills like kigumi and wood joinery.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Violin Concerto by Beethoven
programme.desc: Conducted by Kazuyoshi Akiyama with Akiko Suwanai on the violin, the NHK Symphony Orchestra perform Beethoven's Violin Concerto in D major Op. 61.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy - with the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This time: Hamaura Ayano (a former Hello! Project artist who moved into acting and is now a solo singer) and BUDDiiS, a dance-and-vocal group with 10 unique members.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: An animated series about a Japanese dog who gets lost in New York City. Charo says 'I want to see my owner again!', and so he starts his adventure to find his way back home.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Wang Yuan Wei knows what it's like to feel lost - he now offers children from overseas a safe place to call home where they too can say 'tadaima'.

programme.title: Impacts: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Data centres, the engines of our digital age, consume vast energy and drive a surge in CO2 emissions, intensifying climate risks while powering global connectivity.

programme.title: Designer-Less Design

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet French pastry chef Josselin Rimbod who creates uniquely colourful macarons with local ingredients in Toyama, and German-born Peter Steeger who runs an airfield in Bibai, Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Kaizoku
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea - we explore their history and legacy with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Seto Inland Sea.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster training is advancing with digital technology. See how AR/VR technology is helping participants gain realistic experience about the movement of smoke in fires and the risks of a tsunami.

programme.desc: Covering consumer shopping information, trendy specialty stores, travel guides, and the LOHAS propositions of trendy people.

programme.title: Taiwan Criminal Files - EP 1425
programme.desc: Discuss the difficult inside story behind the news events, lead the audience to explore the development of the event from an objective perspective, and strive to enlighten the audience's new thinking.

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 587
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Eyeshot To The Cross-Strait - EP 809
programme.desc: Discussion on cross-strait issues include: Taiwanese investment, transformation and upgrading, future trends, environmental protection and green energy, cultural and creative consumption, cultural customs, enterprise development, future potential, development trends of cross-strait film and television cooperation

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1165
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 18
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 10
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 29
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 30

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 19
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 26
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a â€˜Fire masterâ€™ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGâ€™s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 15
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 11
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 12
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIâ€™s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 30
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60â€™s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Truth: Final Episode
programme.desc: Raymond's lawyer licence is suspended as he has prevented the course of justice to clear his mother's conviction. He is subsequently framed for murder with every piece of evidence pointing towards him. The only one with proof of his innocence is his dying mother, who fights to stay alive long enough to exonerate her son before it is too late.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well (Extended Version)
programme.desc: In this beloved Hong Kong comedy, the three Chang brothers living with their parents learn that love blossoms with nurture, but withers when taken for granted through haste, deceit, and selfishness. This extended version features an additional shootout scene that was omitted from the original theatrical release during Lunar New Year 2016.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas' pursuit.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called "The Venoms", and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu's enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed "The Invincible Fist" is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Call of Heroes
programme.desc: Aided by a determined lawman and a vagabond warrior, villagers unite to protect their land from a strongman and his thugs during China's Warlord Era.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 36
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Warm on a Cold Night - EP 18
programme.desc: Qian Kingdom's constable Su Jiu Er (Li Yi Tong) possesses a rabbit-like cold-skinned spirit. She meets wolf-like warm-spirited Han Zheng (Bi Wen Jun) from Qi Kingdom's ruling family. This unusual duo forms a close bond as they investigate a strange murder.

programme.title: Subtle Flavors - EP 4
programme.desc: Embark on a food journey across Sichuan, Hunan, and Guangdong. From time-honored recipes to innovative twists, discover the tastes that carry deep cultural roots and heartfelt stories.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 259
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 93
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: The Ordinary Road - EP 1
programme.desc: It tells an inspirational story. Led by experienced seniors in the industry, a group of youngsters who have just started their careers are growing alongside each other and ultimately surpassing themselves through their strong belief, learning from one another.
